h2_title: Where to use the Skandha of Form in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Skandha of Form can be taken to Mount Huago in Chapter 6, alongside the Skandha of Feeling, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice. Upon accessing the Cloud ability in this chapter, you can head towards a massive enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Skandha_of_Form.md', within the main section titled 'Skandha of Form', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Skandha of Form in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Skandha of Form can be taken to Mount Huago in Chapter 6, alongside the Skandha of Feeling, Skandha of Thought, Skandha of Choice. Upon accessing the Cloud ability in this chapter, you can head towards a massive enemy in the distance - the Son of Stones. Fly past this boss, to find a small path leading to the Giant Shigandang.
